edu.rit.pj2.vbl

Class BooleanVbl.And

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.Tuple
      • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.BooleanVbl
        • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.BooleanVbl.And
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Vbl, Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    BooleanVbl

    public static class BooleanVbl.And
extends BooleanVbl
    Class BooleanVbl.And provides a Boolean reduction variable, with Boolean and as the reduction operation.

    • Method Detail

      • reduce

        public void reduce(Vbl vbl)
        Reduce the given shared variable into this shared variable. The two items are combined together using the Boolean and operation, and the result is stored in this shared variable.
        Specified by:
        reduce in interface Vbl
        Overrides:
        reduce in class BooleanVbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the class of vbl is not compatible with the class of this shared variable.
